name: ffoi-data-process
description: Serverless (AWS Lambda) project for FFOI forecast data processing

scripts.integration-test: lab test/integration -v -r console -o stdout -r html -o test/output-integration.html -m 30000
scripts.unit-test: lab test/unit -v -c --coverage-exclude lib/helpers -r console -o stdout -r html -o test/output-unit.html -m 5000
scripts.pre-deployment-test: npm run lint && npm run unit-test

author: The Environment Agency
